name: maithya/paystack-intergration
description: A simple project designed to showcase the seamless integration of both Mpesa and Paystack payment gateways using inline JavaScript. This project provides a practical example of how developers can implement payment solutions for these platforms directly within their web applications. It highlights the step-by-step process, making it easier to understand and apply in real-world scenarios, catering to both mobile money (Mpesa) and card-based (Paystack) payment systems.
